SourcedStatement: Love’s lawyers, from the political law firm Kaufman Legal Group, said in their petition that Love had gathered 67 signatures in total and that three of the signatures were unfairly disqualified.
Name: Kaufman Legal Group
Justification: Love’s lawyers, from the political law firm Kaufman Legal Group, said in their petition that Love had gathered 67 signatures in total and that three of the signatures were unfairly disqualified.

SourcedStatement: The county attorneys countered in a brief that the state election code deems signatures on a nomination form invalid if they don’t include a signature and a printed name and if the address of the candidate’s supporter is not consistent with their voter registration form.
Name: Alameda County Registrar of Voters
Justification: The county attorneys countered in a brief that the state election code deems signatures on a nomination form invalid if they don’t include a signature and a printed name and if the address of the candidate’s supporter is not consistent with their voter registration form.

SourcedStatement: The Alameda County Registrar is scheduled to send the final ballot for printing on Friday.
Name: Alameda County Registrar of Voters
Justification: The Alameda County Registrar is scheduled to send the final ballot for printing on Friday.

SourcedStatement: The message was cheered on by several community members and organizations such as the East Oakland Collective nonprofit.
Name: East Oakland Collective
Justification: The message was cheered on by several community members and organizations such as the East Oakland Collective nonprofit.

SourcedStatement: Tonya Love, former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife, failed to qualify for the council race earlier this month because she hadn’t gathered enough signatures.
Name: Tonya Love
Title: former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife
Justification: Tonya Love, former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife, failed to qualify for the council race earlier this month because she hadn’t gathered enough signatures.

SourcedStatement: “While we are disappointed by the court’s decision not to place us on the ballot in November, I remain undeterred in my commitment to serving Oakland and our communities,” she wrote. “My dedication to our city does not begin nor end with a campaign. There are many ways to effect change and ensure our voices are heard. I will continue to work alongside each of you, advocating for public health, safety, and equitable development in Oakland.”
Name: Tonya Love
Title: former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife
Justification: “While we are disappointed by the court’s decision not to place us on the ballot in November, I remain undeterred in my commitment to serving Oakland and our communities,” she wrote. “My dedication to our city does not begin nor end with a campaign. There are many ways to effect change and ensure our voices are heard. I will continue to work alongside each of you, advocating for public health, safety, and equitable development in Oakland.”

SourcedStatement: Judge Markman said that it appeared that the county registrar, Tim Dupuis, didn’t do “anything wrong” in this instance.
Name: Judge Michael Markman
Title: Alameda County Superior Court Judge
Justification: Judge Markman said that it appeared that the county registrar, Tim Dupuis, didn’t do “anything wrong” in this instance.

SourcedStatement: The lawyer representing Love said that the judge could limit his ruling to the type of unusual last-minute circumstance this represents, in which a candidate had only a couple of days to gather signatures.
Name: lawyer representing Love
Title: lawyer
Justification: The lawyer representing Love said that the judge could limit his ruling to the type of unusual last-minute circumstance this represents, in which a candidate had only a couple of days to gather signatures.

SourcedStatement: In an interview with The Oaklandside last week, Newton was resigned to his failure to gather enough signatures–he picked up 37–but said he would work with whoever came out ahead in the race to help improve the community.
Name: David Newton
Title: nephew of Black Panther Party founder Huey Newton
Justification: In an interview with The Oaklandside last week, Newton was resigned to his failure to gather enough signatures–he picked up 37–but said he would work with whoever came out ahead in the race to help improve the community.

SourcedStatement: Tonya Love, former district director for California Assemblymember Rob Bonta and current chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife, failed to qualify for the council race earlier this month because she hadn’t gathered enough signatures.
Name: Alameda County Registrar of Voters
Justification: To qualify, a candidate needs to gather and submit at least 50 valid signatures; the registrar approved only 47 for Love.

SourcedStatement: The county attorneys countered in a brief that the state election code deems signatures on a nomination form invalid if they don’t include a signature and a printed name and if the address of the candidate’s supporter is not consistent with their voter registration form.

Justification: The county attorneys countered in a brief that the state election code deems signatures on a nomination form invalid if they don’t include a signature and a printed name and if the address of the candidate’s supporter is not consistent with their voter registration form.

SourcedStatement: Under the Voter’s Choice Act, registered voters on Election Day can cast their ballots at any vote center in Alameda County.
Name: Alameda County Registrar of Voters
Justification: Under the Voter’s Choice Act, registered voters on Election Day can cast their ballots at any vote center in Alameda County.
